entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
